strings.tx5: Click the + sign on the left of: Tables
strings.tx6: Click: 00_MASTER Configuration - Centerline Variable Enable Selection
strings.tx8: This table contains all recipes and all variables controlled in each recipe for each machine.
strings.tx9: Be very careful when editing this table! It controls all variables of all machines in the factory. Incorrect changes can compromise compliance and affect the control center operation of other machines.
strings.tx11: Find the variable AS3 GPD Mechanical Fastener in the same row as the Máxima Proteção XG recipe and click the number “1” in that row.
strings.tx13: Done! The variable is now disabled; it may take up to 30 minutes to update in PI Vision, and if the machine is stopped, it may take longer.
strings.tx14: Training completed! If you need support, contact the developer Robson Souza. Email: robson.souza1@kcc.com. You can close this page or return to the home screen and start another training.
strings.tx15: This training simulates the system to ensure learning effectiveness.
strings.tx17:
In this training, you will learn how to disable variables that are not used in certain recipes.

For example: in the Diaper Máxima Proteção XG recipe, FB17 does not use the AS3 GPD Mechanical Fastener variable. As shown in the following image, this can cause a calculation error.

During the training, you will learn how to enable and disable these variables according to each recipe.
strings.tx18: Click again, type 0 and press enter
